solution_line_template: Before dinner, she had {end_of_day_ounces}+{dinner_ounces}=<<{end_of_day_ounces}+{dinner_ounces}={before_dinner}>>{before_dinner} ounces of CM.
Before drinking {lunch_ounces} ounces of CM during lunch, she had {before_dinner}+{lunch_ounces}=<<{before_dinner}+{lunch_ounces}={before_lunch}>>{before_lunch} ounces of CM.
Before buying {bought_ounces} ounces of CM, she had {before_lunch}-{bought_ounces}=<<{before_lunch}-{bought_ounces}={before_buying}>>{before_buying} ounces of CM.
And before breakfast, she had {before_buying}+{breakfast_ounces}=<<{before_buying}+{breakfast_ounces}={start_of_day}>>{start_of_day} ounces of chocolate milk.
